## Checklist

Please verify your PR meets these requirements:

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows the project's style guide (see [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md))
- [ ] `pnpm lint` passes (ESLint)
- [ ] `pnpm type-check` passes (TypeScript)
- [ ] `pnpm build` passes successfully
- [ ] No console errors or warnings

### Documentation

- [ ] Storybook stories added/updated for new components
- [ ] JSDoc comments added for public APIs
- [ ] README updated (if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated (if applicable)

### Testing

- [ ] Changes tested locally
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] Edge cases considered

### Breaking Changes

- [ ] No breaking changes (or documented in PR description)
- [ ] Backwards compatible (or major version bump justified)

### Repository Rules

- [ ] Commits follow the convention format (feat:, fix:, docs:, etc.)
- [ ] Branch name follows convention (feature/, bugfix/, docs/, etc.)
- [ ] No merge commits (rebase before merge)
- [ ] No unrelated changes included
